mapper.select: SELECT RE_NUM, USER_ID, RE_TITLE, SKILL, CAREER, REGION, USER_EDU, USER_CAR, USER_INTRO, USER_IMG FROM RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{ user_id }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME ( RE_NUM, USER_ID, RE_TITLE, SKILL, CAREER, REGION, USER_EDU, USER_CAR, USER_INTRO, USER_IMG ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(RE_NUM), 0)+1 FROM RESUME ), #{ user_id }, #{ re_title }, #{ skill }, #{ career }, #{ region }, #{ user_edu }, #{ user_car }, #{user_intro }, #{user_img } )
